turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Sarah. Do you think you can stop by the the Starbucks on Indian Hill in Claremont and order me a drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order me an Iced White Chocolate Mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Got it. Do you want to add anything extra to the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could you make sure that they put light ice and extra whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So you want a grande, Iced White Chocolate Mocha with light ice and extra whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. How do you want me to pay for it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I already have an account there. So just pay with the account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Let me order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you make sure to get a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. They said that they sent the receipt to you via text. Did you get it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They said that it should be ready shortly at the Starbucks on Indian Hill in Claremont.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.
